item.title: Man suspected of starting Palisades fire indicted; faces 45 years in prison
item.description: Jonathan Rinderknecht, 29, was arrested months after the deadly blaze.

item.title: Family of theater professor who was fatally shot speaks out: 'Senseless loss'
item.description: She was just visiting her family, who remain in Indianapolis, and to help her husband recover following surgery for prostate cancer, friends said.
